name: A GAME (VerminLord317)
description:
In a world, peaceful, serine, full of wonder... The lands are filled with the happy and content creatures of the earth, going about their days as always, enjoying the world around them.... But this peace, the world they knew.. is in your hands. There is more at stake than anyone could understand. This is where you come in... you are the most important part of the entire story! YOU ARE A BUTTON PUSHING CHICKEN!

This game is in development, and really just a random fun project. But it was liked enough here to be worth a try posting it. I hope you like it!

If you enjoy this, tell me your best run time when you beat it! 

If you don't like it, tell me why in a comment!
